room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Great experience. The Apartment room was astonishingly fun, thanks to our gamemaster Robert. Will highly recommend going. Will definitely come back.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: We had an amazing time! And we escaped the Apartment with 11 minutes left! Would definitely go back again! Gianni and Erica were excellent hosts!

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: We escaped! And from one of the most difficult rooms too! Teamwork makes the dream work! 7 of us we did the Apartment. Shawn was an awesome employee. I can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: I've been to Can You Escape LI 4 times now and all my experiences have been very positive. My most recent visit was yesterday with 23 other coworkers for our holiday party there for the second year in a row. Everyone had a great time and the staff was fantastic. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Hello, even though I purchased the experience; it was actually a gift for my three sons and seven nieces and nephews. I can say that they were very happy when they returned and it was the perfect event after our holiday brunch. The best part of the experience is that we didn't have to travel into the cityâ€¦It was right down the block:)
